channel.title: Login tekst
channel.description: Need help with login tekst if the owner login it says.. owner bored has just logged in!

item.title: Login tekst
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

[quote=“Yz85Racer, post:6, topic:170425”][quote author=xx nub xx link=topic=230331.msg1973214#msg1973214 date=1199371815]

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("xx nub xx") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("duke freedom"))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[owner] " +playerName+ " has logged in";
}
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ultima"))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[co-owner] " +playerName+ " has logged in";
}
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("x insanity x") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("i got skillz"))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[ub3r skiller][mod] " +playerName+ " has logged in";
}
else if(playerRights == 2)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[admin] " +playerName+ " has logged in";
}
else if(playerRights == 1 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("x insanity x") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("i got skillz"))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[mod] " +playerName+ " has logged in";
} 
else if (playerRights == 0 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("g e t l  0 w") || playerRights == 4) {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " has logged in";
}
}

add that under public void run()

ROFL, gayest place to add it.

and i care because…

thats just something i ripped out of my v2 server which was almost as bad as regular pimpscape o.O
[/quote]
Which would be as bad as your newest source.[/quote]

rofl ok

if u wanna play my newest source just ask i have the client right here

Read full topic
